title: Set up Vitest testing infrastructure
description: Add vitest as dev dependency, configure vitest.config.ts for ESM/TypeScript, create test directory structure, add test scripts to package.json. This unblocks all QA work.

comments.text: Vitest infrastructure ready: config, scripts, 21 passing tests (errors + youtube). Note: npm has omit=dev globally — use --include=dev for installs.
QA review: found bug — vitest include pattern missed src/__tests__/ files (only matched tests/). Fixed config to include both patterns. 74 tests now discovered and passing.
